brainly_data.question: How does the study of cosmology relate to astronomy
brainly_data.subject: Biology

all_answers.question: How does the study of cosmology relate to astronomy
all_answers.subject: Biology
all_answers.text: Cosmology is a branch off of astronomy, cosmology is the study of large scale properties of the universe as a whole. Astronomy is the study of celestial objects, such as stars, planets, galaxies, etc.
